mapper.insert: insert into follow_tb (follower_user_id, following_user_id, create_dt) values (#{followerUserId}, #{followingUserId}, now())
mapper.select: select follow_id, follower_user_id, following_user_id, create_dt from follow_tb where follower_user_id = #{followerUserId} and following_user_id = #{followingUserId} limit 1;
select (select count(*) from follow_tb where following_user_id = #{userId}) as follower_count, (select count(*) from follow_tb where follower_user_id = #{userId}) as following_count;
select follower_user_id from follow_tb where following_user_id = #{followingUserId}
select following_user_id from follow_tb where follower_user_id = #{followerUserId}

select ft.follow_id, ut.user_id, ut.username, ut.profile_img_url, ft.create_dt from follow_tb ft inner join user_tb ut on ut.user_id = ft.follower_user_id where ft.following_user_id = #{userId} order by ft.create_dt desc;

select ft.follow_id, ut.user_id, ut.username, ut.profile_img_url, ft.create_dt from follow_tb ft inner join user_tb ut on ut.user_id = ft.following_user_id where ft.follower_user_id = #{userId} order by ft.create_dt desc;
